good morning resolution of the
Mississippi Public Service Commission
recognizing the de Vin family for over
75 years of excellent service whereas
the VIN equipment has demonstrated a
steadfast commitment to serving the
equipment and utility service needs of
Mississippi for 50 years contributing to
the state's economic growth and
infrastructure development and where at
as the legacy of D vinni began with
William C dein senior a Visionary
entrepreneur who after receiving
information before World War II about
the potential for outsourc maintenance
services established a company that
began by maintaining rights of way for
telephone and electrical utilities in
central Mississippi using only using
only manual tools and sheer
determination and whereas in the winter
of 1951 a record-breaking ice storm
struck the Deep South crippling
telephone and electrical services
through Mississippi the Vinnie responded
with exceptional dedication growing from
50 to nearly a th000 employees by the
time Services were fully restored
solidifying its reputation as a reliable
partner in times of Crisis and
showcasing the resilience and
adaptability of the company and whereas
the V construction founded in 1947 and
headquartered in Jackson Mississippi has
since grown to employ over 475 people
across 12 offices in mississipp in
Mississippi Louisiana and Tennessee
continuing its tradition of delivering
expertise quality and high customer
service satisfaction and whereas in the
1960s the VIN equipment was established
in southern Hind and Madison counties
becoming an authorized dealer of Kabota
and new Highland equipment while
providing durable machinery and
exemplary customer service and whereas
alongside de vinni equipment magnolia
tree and Baker Services both offshoots
of the original de vinni Construction
Enterprise have also made significant
contributions to maintaining utility
right away clearance and providing
utility M reading Services resp
respectively across the Southern United
States and whereas the V equipment's
commitment to Innovation dependability
and community service has set a
benchmark for excellence in the industry
as demonstrated by its continuous
service to the same electrical and
telephone utility companies that have
trusted it since the company's Inception
now therefore be it resolved that the
Mississippi Public Service Commission
hereby commends and congratulates the
thein family for over 75 years of
excellent service recognizing its
distinguished history of service
resilience and contributions to the
community and the utility sector be it
further resolved that a copy of this
resolution
be presented to the ven equipment in
honor of it Milestone anniversary and be
made available to the public as an
acknowledgement of the company's
achievements and contributions to the
state of Mississippi adopted at the
Mississippi Public Service Commission

Commissioners on August 23rd atmas filed
an applic application to modify the
language of its policy for extension of
gas facilities to clarify that the
infrastructure expansion initiative
applies to high density developments
currently the commission approve
initiative allows atmas to budget
roughly 6 million dollars per year to
expand service to areas where certain
project selection criteria are met the
current shf allows the initiative to
apply to high density residential
developments but it does not explicitly
include language that will allow it to
be used for mixed use developments the
dis filing provides clarifying language

initiative to be used for both assuming

executive session the statute does not
require a second to this motion but the
vote on this motion must be taken in
open meeting if a majority votes to
close the meeting to make a
determination on the question of an
executive session the meeting will be
closed for this purpose no other
business during the closed interim shall
be considered until a vote has been
taken on whether or not to declare an
executive session in order to go into an
executive session a majority must vote
in favor of it following the closed

an open meeting and state the reason for
going into executive session and this
